content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #241

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by @euvitudo
Chapter/section: Event Notification Request Details
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/#event-notification
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary:

Comment: There are two tables in this section; it is not clear what the first is indended to convey. The second appears to match this section, but the first does not. Suggest clarifying what these represent.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #241

During conversation at the Montreal, May 2019 working group meeting, @wdbr, @wmaethner, @NiklasSvenzen and myself talked through this issue and would like to propose:

Proposed resolution: Persusasive

We will clarify the purpose of the first table (to describe the top level elements of the json object)

isaacvetter edited a comment on Issue #241

wmaethner commented on Issue #241

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Niklas Svenzen

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described, add clarification to the tables (e.g. adding table names and referencing the tables by name).

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
